description: Adds a history of a wall value. A history is a table of floating point values assigned by sampling a model attribute periodically during a simulation. The history can be assigned a name for later reference with the optional name keyword, if not the history will be given a default name based on its internally assigned id number. Following one of the keywords given below, either 1) an additional 'id' keyword followed by an integer id, 2) an additional 'name' keyword followed by a string s, or 3) an additional 'position' keyword followed by a position vector v must be given to define the specific wall.

keywords.name: displacement
keywords.description: Magnitude of accumulated wall displacement vector as a result of cycling

keywords.name: displacement-x
keywords.description: X-component of accumulated displacement as a result of cycling

keywords.name: displacement-y
keywords.description: Y-component of accumulated displacement as a result of cycling

keywords.name: displacement-z
keywords.description: Z-component of accumulated displacement as a result of cycling (3D ONLY)

keywords.name: euler-x
keywords.description: X-euler angle (in degrees) of current wall orientation (3D ONLY). Updated only when orientation tracking is enabled

keywords.name: euler-y
keywords.description: Y-euler angle (in degrees) of current wall orientation (3D ONLY). Updated only when orientation tracking is enabled

keywords.name: euler-z
keywords.description: Z-euler angle (in degrees) of current wall orientation (3D ONLY). Updated only when orientation tracking is enabled

keywords.name: extra
keywords.syntax: extra index <i> type <typename> id <i> | name <s> | position <v>
keywords.description: Track history of an extra variable. Use 'index' to specify extra index and 'type' to specify the type

keywords.name: force-contact
keywords.description: Magnitude of the force resulting from contacts

keywords.name: force-contact-x
keywords.description: X-component of the contact force

keywords.name: force-contact-y
keywords.description: Y-component of the contact force

keywords.name: force-contact-z
keywords.description: Z-component of the contact force (3D ONLY)

keywords.name: moment-contact
keywords.description: {Value in 2D; Magnitude in 3D} of the sum of the contact moments

keywords.name: moment-contact-x
keywords.description: X-component of the contact moment (3D ONLY)

keywords.name: moment-contact-y
keywords.description: Y-component of the contact moment (3D ONLY)

keywords.name: moment-contact-z
keywords.description: Z-component of the contact moment (3D ONLY)

keywords.name: position-x
keywords.description: X-component of the location of wall centroid

keywords.name: position-y
keywords.description: Y-component of the location of wall centroid

keywords.name: position-z
keywords.description: Z-component of the location of wall centroid (3D ONLY)

keywords.name: rotation
keywords.description: Current wall orientation (2D ONLY). Updated only when orientation tracking is enabled

keywords.name: spin
keywords.description: {Value in 2D; Magnitude in 3D} of the wall angular velocity in radians per second

keywords.name: spin-x
keywords.description: X-component of the wall angular velocity in radians per second (3D ONLY)

keywords.name: spin-y
keywords.description: Y-component of the wall angular velocity in radians per second (3D ONLY)

keywords.name: spin-z
keywords.description: Z-component of the wall angular velocity in radians per second (3D ONLY)

keywords.name: velocity
keywords.description: Magnitude of the wall translational velocity vector

keywords.name: velocity-x
keywords.description: X-component of the wall velocity

keywords.name: velocity-y
keywords.description: Y-component of the wall velocity

keywords.name: velocity-z
keywords.description: Z-component of the wall velocity (3D ONLY)

examples.description: Track contact force magnitude for wall ID 1, name history 'wall1_force'
Track x-velocity for wall nearest to position (0,0,5)
Track z-velocity for wall ID 100, name history 'bottom_vel'
Track x-component of contact force for wall named 'boundary'
Track z-component of angular velocity for wall ID 5 (3D)

examples.command: wall history extra index 1 type float id 10
examples.description: Track extra variable at index 1 (float type) for wall ID 10

python_sdk_alternative.workaround: itasca.command('wall history ...') - Python SDK does not provide history recording. Use history commands for manipulation
